titleStmt.title: The speech of the Right Reverend Anthony Bishop of Meath when the clergy waited on His Majesty at his camp nigh Dublin, July 7, 1690 : together with His Majesty's most gracious answer.
titleStmt.author: Dopping, Anthony, 1643-1697.
William III, King of England, 1650-1702.

publicationStmt.publisher: by the heir of Andrew Anderson,
